message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $150?

Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm definitely interested, but $150 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. Would you be open to $125? Let's see if we can find a price that works for both of us.
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see that you're willing to pay $125, but I was thinking more along the lines of $145. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I understand, Alice. I'm willing to pay $135, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. How about we split the difference?
I like your spirit, Bob! I can see you're willing to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
